<div class="treeview"><onlyinclude>
** {{nbt|compound|minecraft:enchantable}}: If this and <code>[[Data component format#enchantments|minecraft:enchantments]]</code> are present on an item, and applicable enchantments are available, the item can be enchanted in an enchanting table.
*** {{nbt|int|value}}: Positive integer representing the item's [[Enchanting mechanics#How enchantments are chosen|enchantability]]. A higher value allows enchantments with a higher cost to be picked.
</onlyinclude>
